select a.news_id ,coalesce(a.news_type ,'0') as news_type ,coalesce(a.news_title ,'' ) as news_title ,coalesce(a.news_subtitle ,'' ) as news_subtitle ,coalesce(a.news_abstract ,'' ) as news_abstract from news a left join news_range b on a.news_id = b.news_id where b.range_type = 2 and b.circle_id = #{compID}
order by coalesce( a.weights_order,9999999999) asc , a.create_time desc limit #{startRow } , #{size }

select a.user_id ,case when b.user_competition_status in ('97','98') then '0' else coalesce( b.user_competition_status ,'0') end as user_competition_status ,case when d.join_club_status in ('97','98') then '0' else coalesce (d.join_club_status , '0') end as join_club_status ,coalesce(c.club_status,'3') as club_status from user_info a left join user_competition b on a.user_id = b.user_id and b.competition_id =#{competition_id} left join user_detail d on a.user_id = d.user_id left join club c on c.club_id = d.club_id where a.user_id = #{user_id} and a.platform_id = #{platform_id}
